title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
Got an A1278 that had corrupted efi. Flashed new one with old serial and me region. New hard drive cable, no success installing os.

Internet recovery gives error -1001f
Cmd  +  s gives  error loading kernel cache 0x9

Any idea?

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
I can suppose 2936, or 3115, as you mention ME region.
Maybe is possible to tell us the exact board model...

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message: yes sorry totally forgot, it is a 820-3115-b  tried both a clean ME and the old ME

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
Efi was corrupted, hdd was dead. installed brand new hdd. internet recovery gives -1001f (2048/1024) as soon as you press the recovery combination.
During the installation of sierra trough usb thumbdrive when it reaches around 80% it shuts itself off

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
Where did you get clean ME dump?
Can you run ASD?

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message: Used intel easy clean me tool to clean my old one.  Haven't ran asd yet

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message: Intel easy clean is for inject a new Clean ME region, the ME region included on the package are RAW versions, you should use Intel FIT to actually fit the ME region..

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
I tried this one from an old Duke post 

[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByfhQ_x0v-tZYy1WaGhQNTVQME0[/url]

But same crap. On Monday I will try the long way with FITC... If i can find it

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
If duke posted clean ME dump, that is correctly done for sure...
Use it as is for test, do not change serial; you can get bad file if Fsys area is not changed correctly.

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message: All right sounds good. Will test this monday and let you know

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
tried everything. cam back to this machine now but nothing. bottom of my drawer and i have to fix it... it works only if i install the os on another machine and then put the ssd on this one. even tried update to mojave from sierra from inside the machine but once it finish installing it reboots and it hangs once the loading line on apple logo reaches 100%, but the isight works.. and no 30min watchdog.. ideas?

internet recovery goes on:

- 1001F (2048/1024)

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
ran a second time efi one and it gives 

Error-buffer too small-

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
Replaced ram with a brand new one. Cleaned slots. Replaced cpu paste. Asd hangs and freeze here 

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Fw69biO.jpg[/img]

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message: it is a 820-3115... i am starting to believe there are some issues with the ram slots

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
Use only one RAM module at a time.
It accepts all DDR3 types, but is better to test with 10600.

BTW, set "On Error" option to continue.

"Error-buffer too small-"
The error is related to which test?

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message:
i did use only on ram module. 

the error was on ram test. but it stopped doing that with a corsair macmemory. although now it hangs directly.  tried yet another bank on 10600 using a bit of thermal pad under the ram slot and it passed asd. gonna try to install hs and see what happens

title: A1278 error loading kernel cache 0x9
message: nope.... high sierra from a usb key crashes after reaching aroun 80% installation. and internet recovery gives the 1024/2048 error with the only ram bank that actually passes asd... amazing
